name: The Saint
description:
Something happened on Halloween night, and the father will have to rescue the cursed daughter from the clutches of monsters.

Moving direction:
    X-Input D-Pad
    X-Input Left Stick
    Keyboard - WASD
    Keyboard - Arrows

 Punch and kick:
    X-Input X
    Keyboard - C, Ctrl

 Jump:
    X-Input A
    Keyboard - Space

The game was made for the "Halloween 2020: Cursed Children!" jam on gamedev.ru
